text: geudeul-ege aejung-i iss-eulttaemyeon seonjijadeul-ege jueojin geosgwa ttoggat-eun geos-i jueojil ttaekkaji ulineun midji anhgessdago malhadeola hananim-eun geubun ui mesejileul suhaenghan gosgwa bangbeob-eul asim-ila saaghan jadeul-eun god hana nim ap-eseo gul-yoggwa geudeul-ui eummo-e daehan daegalo eomhan beol-eul bad-eulila
